member.name: T:DataTypeConversionLib.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:DataTypeConversionLib.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:DataTypeConversionLib.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.summary: Converts all keys of formcollection object to hashtable as per their datatypes mentioned in tableclass
member.param: Corresponding tableclass object from which datatypes has to be extracted

member.summary: get data row from model object

member.summary: convert json into datatable with removing speces from row's values

member.name: T:DataTypeConversionLib.DTResult`1
member.summary: A full result, as understood by jQuery DataTables.
member.typeparam: The data type of each row.

member.name: P:DataTypeConversionLib.DTResult`1.draw
member.summary: The draw counter that this object is a response to - from the draw parameter sent as part of the data request. Note that it is strongly recommended for security reasons that you cast this parameter to an integer, rather than simply echoing back to the client what it sent in the draw parameter, in order to prevent Cross Site Scripting (XSS) attacks.

member.name: P:DataTypeConversionLib.DTResult`1.recordsTotal
member.summary: Total records, before filtering (i.e. the total number of records in the database)

member.name: P:DataTypeConversionLib.DTResult`1.recordsFiltered
member.summary: Total records, after filtering (i.e. the total number of records after filtering has been applied - not just the number of records being returned for this page of data).

member.name: P:DataTypeConversionLib.DTResult`1.data
member.summary: The data to be displayed in the table. This is an array of data source objects, one for each row, which will be used by DataTables. Note that this parameter's name can be changed using the ajaxDT option's dataSrc property.
